title: ColdLava40
author: ColdLava40
content: With the current situation happening in Nigeria, we are not even sure if things might get any better soon. Dis mata neva stil clear for some piple eye, bcus dem fit dey see food chop everyday.It is interesting to know that some people have realized that the government can't do anything for them, which has made them to take tough decision by striving hard to meet their personal needs.So like this, some people dey wait, while others done take bold step to save themselves from this financial crisis.So my question for us today as Nigerians, Should we wait or take a bold step ?.

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: De there they wait before you take step, If hunger wipe you nobody go tell you to take bold step you go run go take am. We pray for a better country oneday but right now you should not wait for the government to do anything for you, the economy situation of the country is not new thing to us so by now we all should have prepared ourselves on how not to be reliant on the government. Not just the government, try not to be reliant on anyone so take the bold step and save yourself I believe one day Nigeria go better.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Quote from: ColdLava40 on September 19, 2023, 09:03:34 PMSo like this, some people dey wait, while others done take bold step to save themselves from this financial crisis.So my question for us today as Nigerians, Should we wait or take a bold step ?.Here comes another serious issues to look after, as a citizen of any country you are not expected to seat idle or fold your arms waiting for government to bring all you needs to your door steps rather move out there look for what to do and think positives about your live than seating in a place waiting so called government to come rescue you for something you know you can do more better. There is a popular saying that keeps saying "Don't wait for what your country could do for you, think of what you could do for your country to be more better" I know this side of my post will stir up hatred but the truth be told.We are tired of hearing government that government this because we aren't to solely depends on them between government can not offer jobs to  all her citizens to work so we our selves needs to create job opportunities for people around us then we can make our country a better place to resides, though we knew that our government aren't trying but let us not use it as a yardstick whereby you can use them for fun rather we should work our parts. Believe me or not there were some others who made it without the aids of the governments, you are here today is a privilege for you to developed yourself more better because even the government will never give you this forum if they knew about here rather they would made available for their loves one to start glance through and enjoys all the benefits from here. So I will actually advise you to reduce your attention from governments to self development and learn skills that could reshaping your mental thinking and ways of behaviors otherwise you could be mentally affected while thinking and waiting for your government to come rescue you.Please do not mind my post because we are all suffering and sharing pains and burden together, so the best is just move on don't wait for anyone not even your close relatives to come assists you for something you knew you could move away to sources it for yourself instead of waiting for some groups of old men that is already closed to their grave to help you do some changes in the country. Please go for skill and forget about governments, thank God you are in this forum please focused to read things that will benefits you instead of thinking of long gone people.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: You no dey clear for the wait and take a bold step wey you mention. You need to clear us make e no be say na parable you don begin use dey follow us talk. So wetin you mean by wait or take a bold step , over what?Nigeria case no be wetin dem dey put mouth again because water don pass carry. If you want to increase electricity tariff to 40% then you go need to dey bring the light na so that person no go still dey burn gen, abi no be so? But Naija government no dey want do the right thing.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: ColdLava40 on September 19, 2023, 09:03:34 PMSo my question for us today as Nigerians, Should we wait or take a bold step ?.What the heck? Wait for what? You better stand up and safe yourself because no one will come and safe you,  this is not only applicable to Nigeria alone but all other part of the world,  people are beginning to pursuit after self freedom and in doing to you have to take the bold step to become financially free, because all other part of freedom still rely on finances to survive and that is why financial freedom is very important in any part of the world. The government can't do anything about that,  because some of the economic crisis os a global crisis such as inflation and the rest of the other outcome of economic meltdown that have affected global economy.

comments.author: Perfectbaby
comments.body: Wait for the government they are coming maybe it will be when you might have joined your ancestors, do you think those people we called our government today are really ready to look after their citizens?We can not make progress by folding our hands and waiting for government to come give us food in our various home rather it should a thing of challenge for you to sermon courage to think out of the box if not hunger go kill you inside were you dey now, omo go hustle oo no wait for any careless person oo

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: ColdLava40 on September 19, 2023, 09:03:34 PMSo my question for us today as Nigerians, Should we wait or take a bold step ?.Here is the truth both for Nigeria and in our personal lives.Nobody is coming to save you. You have to be your own savior and messiah. The day that man desires to spring up and take a bold step, then the universe will conspire to help with. He'll start to attract the help the he desiresYou can take a bold step but how fast you run depends on the what's is pursuing you. And in this case what is pursuing the most of us is the government, the Nigeria Police, increasing food prices, high electricity prices and many other things.

Even the so called government personnel are watching those video and making themselves happy as well, just take a look at 10 year old boy Kiriku is doing pretty much fine without waiting for his father, mother and brothers to give him go ahead order but his doing it fine and today if I am not lying he is the bread winner of their family. He just posted a new Lexus he bought few days or weeks ago, there is no government behind him rather is his skills that fetch him those money (wealth) that he is swimming on today, so let us learn to be creative and utilized every golden opportunities we sees today.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: ColdLava40 on September 19, 2023, 09:03:34 PMWith the current situation happening in Nigeria, we are not even sure if things might get any better soon. Dis mata neva stil clear for some piple eye, bcus dem fit dey see food chop everyday.Nigerian is too big for one person to rule and using the method of governance that we have now that everybody reports to the president is rubbish. We supposed dey for a government like the Americans wey be say every state go find their own belle and dey give commission to the federal government. From those taxes, the federal government go come dey assist the state government on some kind things wey dey hard dem and no be this one wey just few states dey do all the work and dem go come share everything to other states wey no dey do anything. This is just making the governor lazy. If each governor was demanded to make a manifesto on how him go move the state forward through the national resource wey dem get, e for make sense then this one wey be say dem go just set down for office dey receive allocation from federal government from other states hustle.Quote from: ColdLava40 on September 19, 2023, 09:03:34 PMIt is interesting to know that some people have realized that the government can't do anything for them, which has made them to take tough decision by striving hard to meet their personal needs.E dey work for dem abi e no dey work for dem, if you wan make am for this life no where wey you wait on the government. The government can only make life comfortable to you reach some can side but if you wan touch block you need hustle without depending on the government. We don't have to wait on the government because dey don't have much things offer especially this our Nigeria government. We need stand up and take advantage of the internet and hustle our own hustle and I no mean fraud oh, I mean legit hustle wey be say you no go fear to dey spend your money because e clean. Dem dun share Nigeria finish and e no go easy to get am back but you can hustle today so your children no go dey at disadvantage like the rest of us but go get some kind privileges wey go give dem a head start for life.

Let us believe that with dem or with out dem we go still survive, we should all drop our pride and do any type of handwork to dey survive, riches is from God so do not underestimate any kind of hustle, let all been patient and focus on our dream.
